title: Ticket #6849: Debian and Ubuntu packages fail if condor user exists
description:
User sandah on the #distcomp IRC channel reports the following: 

the condor ubuntu package seems to fail if the condor user exists. Is there a workaround for this?
there is a Debian bug related to it 684463 which appears to still happen from the packages in the uw repo for 8.8.
remarks:
2019-Jan-08 16:11:27 by jfrey:
Followup from sandah: 
I was able to block the general condor user from ldap to get it installed.
creator: jfrey
